ns UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; UAE Leasing <uaeleasing@chalhoub.com>; Rent <Rent@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE Opening | DE Beers – Dubai Mall On 8th Mar 2025
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have an Opening of New Store “DE Beers Boutique at Dubai Mall” The handover will be on 5th  Mar 2025 and the opening date is on Sun 8th  Mar 2025.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

‑

	
 

 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/> 

CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <http://www.chalhoubgroup.com/>
